Welcome To Uruk GNU/Linux

A fast, simple and powerful GNU/Linux distribution

Uruk GNU/Linux is a distribution of the GNU operating system, with the Linux-libre kernel.
It comes ready for home and office use, and programs are easy to find and install.
Uruk GNU/Linux is currently based on Trisquel GNU/Linux core.



The audio file below shows how to pronounce the word "uruk" correctly:




%100 Free !

  • Uruk's developers are committed to software liberty. We follow the Free System Distribution Guidelines. These guidelines extend the free software definition to ensure that you can use, study, modify, and share every piece of this project under free licenses.

    • Fully Control

  • Uruk GNU/Linux's default desktop environment is "Mate DE" with some Compiz tricks. Uruk offers simple, user-friendly graphical interfaces. Mate Control Centre allows you to adjust aspects of your system to your preference, and the Update Manager promises similar ease-of-use for software updates.

    • Simple

  • Uruk GNU/Linux comes with software for popular computing tasks. Uruk includes software for productivity, web browsing, email, audio, graphics, and more.

    • Install RPM packages on your system:

  • Do not try to wake up from sleep
    Yes, it's not a dream its fact
    Just type in terminal
    u-rpmi
    Followed by the file you want install it For example
    u-rpmi file.rpm

    • Install programs from source:

  • with Uruk gnu/linux Building software from source is very easy Just type in the terminal
    u-src
    Followed by the file you want install it For example:
    u-src src.tar.gz

    • Using any package managers Commands:

  • Uruk GNU/Linux comes with Package Managers Simulator. This program can simulate a popular package managers' commands. This means that you can install, uninstall, update, and remove packages with any package manager you wish.




    • Uruk Docker

    We have docker Image for uruk gnu/linux
    you can use it by install docker then type:
    docker run alimiracle/urukos /bin/bash





    Get Involved

    you can help our project In many ways! Here are some:
    Using Uruk GNU/Linux, and sharing it with your friends and family. Reporting issues and bugs that you find. suggesting improvements. Helping in the forums. Writing and translating documentations or applications. Designing . If you have experience developing software for uruk.

    So as you see, anyone would have the skills to help in some way, but if you lack the time you can still contribute by spreading Uruk GNU/Linux through social networks, publications and free software events.
    if you want to be one of our development team read this first





    Contact With Us

      Join us in mailing list, To subscribe to the list, just send a mail to uruk-request@lists.tuxfamily.org â€” with subject : "subscribe" A mail is sent back to confirm the request. To unsubscribe, it's the same thing but with the subject being "unsubscribe". And to annoy the user till the end, confirmation is needed too. to Post in this list send your msg to uruk@lists.tuxfamily.org

    Get Uruk GNU/Linux NOW !

    You can Download Uruk GNU/Linux ISO now :


    32 bit, compatible with all PCs from Pentium Pro onwards, including 64 bit ones. "download md5 file "

    uruk_1.0 i686


    64 bit, when compatible, works faster and allows the use of more RAM. "download md5 file "

    uruk_1.0 64
